在mysql中，该命令是描述指定数据表的结构的命令。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you describe the last time you saw him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能描述一下当时的情况吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Max. How would you describe our apartment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克斯，你会怎么描述我们的公寓？

yingyinNormal.en: It's all how you describe it. So let's start lying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就看你怎么描述美化它，快来发挥骗功吧。

yingyinNormal.en: First time you died, what happened? You killed a Mimic? Yes. Describe it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一次死是什么情况？你杀了个"拟态"(Mimics) ，描述一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you for coming today. And, Mr. Crouse, can you please describe what you witnessed?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你今天能来，克劳斯先生，能否请你描述一下你的所见？

yingyinNormal.en: We have to fill these out. Describe illness or injury. I dislocated my shoulder. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得先填表格。请描述病情和伤情情况。肩膀脱臼。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: First question: Describe your neighborhood. Run-down with a bunch of rats. Old-world charm. Pet-friendly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一个问题"描述一下周围环境"。房子破烂，鼠辈横行。古色古香，欢迎宠物。

yingyinNormal.en: A hero doesn't brag, he deflects. But he still has to describe. People need to hear the horror.
yingyinNormal.zh: 英雄不会自吹自擂，他对此避而不谈，但他仍需描述当时的场面，人们想要听到当时的可怕场面。

yingyinNormal.en: If I were to give you this gift basket, based on that action alone and no other data, infer and describe the hypothetical relationship that exists between us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我送给你这个礼物篮，根据这个行为本身，如果没有其他数据请推断并描述我们之间的假定关系。

yingyinNormal.en: Compared to what? The idea that you're the only intelligent species, on the only inhabitable planet in a universe so full of planets that you don't even have a number to describe how many there are?
yingyinNormal.zh: 与什么相比？尤其是当宇宙中充满无数行星，数量多到在你们的世界都没有单位可以描述。

yingyinNormal.en: Vintage doesn't even begin to describe what we have planned.
yingyinNormal.zh: 老式这个词不足以形容我们的计划。

yingyinNormal.en: I wasn't trying to sell anything. Just describe my experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也没想推销什么，就是讲下我的感受。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Joshua, I would not describe your product testing as perfected.
yingyinNormal.zh: 约书亚先生，测试的结果并不如人意。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks man, that would have been really hard to describe. What is that taste?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢了，不然还真难形容。什么味道？

yingyinNormal.en: It was more than just a fling, wasn't it? How did she describe it? I didn't ask.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们不只是一时冲动吧？她怎么说的？我没问。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, use your words, buddy. I have more than enough words to describe you, Stark.
yingyinNormal.zh: 动嘴别动手哥们。语言已经不足以形容你了，史塔克。

yingyinNormal.en: A laser cannon? We're not sure how to describe a weapon of this scale. It's another Death Star.
yingyinNormal.zh: 激光炮吗？我们不知道怎么形容此种规模的武器。又是一颗死星。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you accuse my uncle, brother to the Khan, of treason? I only describe what I see, as I saw it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是在指控我的叔叔大汗的兄弟有意谋反吗？我只是如实说出我所见的情况。

yingyinNormal.en: Tammi Westall is one of the top engineers here, and even she struggles to simply describe the size of Intel's chips.
yingyinNormal.zh: 泰米·卫士图是这里顶级的工程师，她现在正在努力简化芯片的尺寸。

yingyinNormal.en: How can I describe it? Good food is like music you can taste, color you can smell. There is excellence all around you. You need only be aware to stop and savor it. Oh, Gusteau was right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 该怎么形容呢? 美食就像可口的音乐，闻得到的色彩，你的身边处处皆美食，你只须留心并伫足品尝。食神说得对。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Fortunately, there's another sort of parent that's a bit easier to <highlight>describe</highlight>: a patient parent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 幸运的是，还有另一种家长更容易描述：耐心的家长。

examination_example.sentence: The 8-0 objection to President Obama turns on what Justice Samuel Alito <highlight>describes</highlight> in his objection as "a shocking assertion of federal executive power".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这次反对奥巴马总统出现8:0投票结果，是由于Samuel Alito法官在他的反对意见中描述为“对联邦执行权令人震惊的维护”。

examination_example.sentence: Nobel Laureate and physiologist Albert Szent-Györgyi once <highlight>described</highlight> discovery as "seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody has thought."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 诺贝尔奖获得者和生理学家Albert Szent-Györgyi曾经把发现描述为“看到每个人看到的，思考没有人思考过的。”

sense_info_list.en: mark out or draw; to form a particular shape

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 描述；描写；形容；类别

word_family.mean: v. 描述；形容；标示；画；画出（想像的几何图形的）轮廓

examination_example.sentence: The British traveler Charles Thompson <highlight>described</highlight> himself as "being impatiently desirous of viewing a country so famous in history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国旅行者 Charles Thompson 形容自己“急不可耐地渴望参观一个历史上如此著名的国家。

examination_example.sentence: Writing in the journal, the scientists <highlight>describe</highlight> how the storks from Germany were clearly affected by the presence of waste sites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在杂志上，科学家描述了来自德国的鹳是如何受到垃圾场的明显影响的。

examination_example.sentence: The details (of the Paris agreement) on addressing "climate justice" can be best <highlight>described</highlight> as sketchy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《巴黎协定》在解决“气候公平性”问题上的细节可以说是粗略无比。

sense_info_list.en: mark out or draw a figure

examination_example.sentence: Milk is increasingly being <highlight>described</highlight> in a negative light.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们对牛奶的描述正变得越来越消极。

examination_example.sentence: My house is about the size you <highlight>described</highlight>, but my neighbor's is bigger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的房子和你描述的差不多大，但是我邻居的要更大。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists shaped the history of the terms while attempting to accurately <highlight>describe</highlight> how humans continue to alter the planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们在试图准确描述人类是如何继续改变地球的同时，塑造了这些术语的历史。

sense_info_list.en: mark out or draw a figure

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 描述；形容；标示；画；画出（想像的几何图形的）轮廓

examination_example.sentence: Which of the following best <highlight>describes</highlight> the breeding programme?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下哪一项最能描述育种计划？

examination_example.sentence: In the fictional worlds of film and TV, artificial intelligence (Al) has been <highlight>described</highlight> as so advanced that it is indistinguishable from humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在电影和电视的虚构世界中，人工智能（AI）被描述为如此先进，以至于与人类无异。

examination_example.sentence: Hearing these stories, I'm skeptical about the place — other destinations are <highlight>described</highlight> as ＂purer＂ natural experiences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听到这些故事，我对这个地方持怀疑态度——其他目的地被描述为“更纯粹”的自然体验。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能描述一下你的家乡吗？

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>describes</highlight> the habit of snubbing someone in favor of a mobile phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它描述了为了手机而冷落人的习惯。

examination_example.sentence: Even today, the hard working useful people are <highlight>described</highlight> as "the salt of the earth".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使在今天，辛勤有用之人也被称为“地球之盐(社会中坚)”。

word_usage.usage: 表示“向…...描述”，不可用 describe sb. sth. 结构，sb.须由介词to引出。如 describe to sb. sth. 或 describe sth. to sb.。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指说明某人或某事物的细节，使有清晰的形象。
着重能够栩栩如生地把事物或场景等描绘出来。
指以一种清楚明了的方式讲解某事。
